name: Play & Learn Spanish - Alphabet for kids
name_original: Play & Learn Spanish - Alphabet for kids
description:
Learn & Play Spanish is a fun game developed with the aim of learning the Spanish alphabet. Through form words and phrases typical Spanish, the children discover the customs and geography of the country while they have fun and learn the language.
The educational method used in Spanish Learn & Play is based on the repetition of concepts associated with fun elements facilitating their comprehension and retention.
Learn & Play Spanish is a game and a toy at a time, since virtually all elements of the game are interactive, providing hours and hours of fun.
